title: The Matrix 1999 BluRay New Re-edited Copy
description:
This is the original Matrix in HD widescreen. 

It's been re-edited with information about the characters, pictures of the characters in everyday life, fan art of the characters, fan tattoos, and video clips from the original Matrix, the matrix Reloaded, and The Matrix Revolutions, and music videos for music that is played in the original Matrix.



The original movie remains un-changed. These additional materials are placed on top
of the video in out-of-the-way spots and are meant to compliment the film.



I'm really proud of this, and I feel like it brings something fresh and new to the table for huge fans out there like myself. 



Technical details:

Res: 1920 x 796 

Fps: 23 

Format: AVI

Size: 3.31GB

Running Time: 2 hours 16 minutes 18 seconds




Don't forget to leave comments, and please enjoy!  :)

-Wayne
